name: Global Speciality Chemicals
description: Traders and Exporters of superior ADDOLA
overview:
Established in the year 2003, we, “Global Speciality Chemicals”, are a prominent organization engaged in trading & exporting a remarkable ADDOLANE™ (SULFOLANE).

Aim / Vision / Mission: “To be the preferred partner to our customers by providing the highest quality chemical products, minimum delivery time, competitive prices and building everlasting relationships.

Core Competences: We are as a professional chemical trade and export company in Saudi Arabia. Our company is an integration of production, scientific research, industry and trade.

GLOBAL MARKETING: Our businesses have already extended to more than 50 countries separately located in Europe, America, East & South Asia, Africa and Oceania.

Industries We Serve: “Global Speciality Chemicals” supply products to the following Industries in the Middle East and North Africa.

Our Team: Bolstered by a team of dexterous professionals, we have been able to provide our valued clients with the best ADDOLANE™ (SULFOLANE).

Service: “Time and tide waits for none”. With our experience in operations we understand the value of timely deliveries. We understand the cost of plant downtime due to delayed supplies.
